tweet: SASTA, the bill I introduced w/ @RepSherrill today, fights back against academic espionage at our research universities like @OhioState and @cwru by helping federal agencies and our universities collaborate to better protect research. Learn more here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=95 …

#OH universities doing cutting edge research are a target for nations like #China who are actively stealing our world renowned R&D. I introduced a bill today to fight this foreign hostility and protect our national security and economic future. More here:  https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=95 …

My thoughts are with all those impacted by tornadoes and severe weather in the Buckeye State last night. Thank you to all those who are working quickly to restore power and clear debris. Stay safe everyone!

.@RepGolden, @RepHoulahan, @RepGallagher, @RepJohnKatko and I just sent a letter to leadership outlining our serous concerns with today's missed opportunity to pass legislation that could have addressed the rising costs of prescription drugs. This #policeweek I'm working w/ @SenSherrodBrown @JimInhofe and @RepKendraHorn to keep our police force and our community safe by improving police training for behavioral health crisis situations, including mental health issues and opioid abuse. This week: my legislation to help law enforcement leverage new technology, a @housesciencegop hearing on diversity in STEM and my amendment with @RepDaveJoyce to actually address protecting preexisting conditions. Watch my #WeeklyUpdate here to learn more: https://youtu.be/Bs8GhkiQPUg

Yesterday at a @housesciencegop hearing I talked to Dr. James Moore, Vice Provost for Diversity and Inclusion and Chief Diversity Officer @OhioState about the importance of a diverse STEM workforce. Catch our conversation here: https://youtu.be/_c2ljWrDBjM

Proud to share my legislation to help law enforcement and financial institutions leverage new tech to combat illicit activities passed @FinancialCmte yesterday as part of a larger bill. As the front runner in innovation, we should be leveraging technology to keep our nation safe.

.@RepDaveJoyce and I proposed an amendment to today's messaging bill to actually protect people with preexisting conditions if the ACA is ruled unconstitutional. @HouseDemocrats blocked it in committee. Today the House is voting on a bill @HouseDemocrats are claiming protects preexisting conditions... It does not. Don't believe me? Read it for yourself here: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/986/text …

I am pleased to hear of the ceasefire struck between Israel and Hamas over the past 24 hours. The United States stands with the people of Israel and supports their right to self-defense from terrorist organizations like Hamas.

Yesterday @USCBO estimated the #CREATESAct I cosponsored would decrease the deficit by $3.9 billion over 10 yrs, all by helping generic drugs to enter the market sooner. Lowering the cost of prescription drugs is critical to fixing healthcare. Proud to support this bill.

Proud that legislation I introduced alongside @RepHaleyStevens, @RepEBJ, @RepBalderson and @RepTomReed to strengthen our manufacturing industry passed @housesciencegop today!
